Description: Blazor is a feature of ASP.NET for building interactive web UIs using C# instead of JavaScript. It's real .NET running in the browser on WebAssembly.

Title: Fun(c) 2018.7: John De Goes - FP to the Max
Description:
What happens when you take a procedural program riddled with partial functions and effects, and incrementally refactor it to a purely functional program—and then dial it up to eleven? In this live coding session, John hopes you'll be amused and a maybe little terrified as he shows you where pure FP leads on one of the simplest programs possible, pointing out both the benefits and the costs of pure functional programming, and giving you an appreciation for how functional programming techniques scale to and deliver the most benefit in very large teams and very large applications.

Code: https://gist.github.com/jdegoes/1b43f43e2d1e845201de853815ab3cb9

Web: http://tiny.cc/Func
Twitter: @fun_c_

Hosted by Expedia Group, Inc.

Title: Testing Incrementally with ZIO Environment by John De Goes - Signify Technology
Description: Do you want to achieve testability? You can achieve it using environmental effects! In this article by John De Goes you'll see that environmental effects can provide easier testability without sacrificing teachability, abstraction, or type inference. 'In my last post, I introduced ZIO Environment, which is a new feature in ZIO that bakes in a high-performance, type-safe, and fully-inferred reader effect into the ZIO data type.
